name: Breeze Display
author: Michael Gyura

sections.description:
A plugin that brings in your Breeze church management software data (events, full calendar, pledges, donations and contributions) for display on your WordPress website. It can be displayed via widgets on a sidebar or shortcodes within pages and posts.

This plugin is built and supported by Worship Times and is not an official product of Breeze.
sections.installation:
1. Place the ‘wt-breeze’ folder in your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the Breeze Display plugin.
  3. Visit ‘Settings > Breeze Settings’ and link to your Breeze account.
  4. Change the setting to fit your needs.
  5. Create or edit a page/post and use the add media > Breeze Events, Breeze Full Calendar or Breeze Campaigns link to select your data or drag the widget to your sidebar.
sections.faq:
Do I need a Breeze account?

Yes. This plugin pulls in from your Breeze account and uses the data you create. To start a Breeze membership click here.

Will this work with other church management software?

No. This plugin is developed to work with Breeze only

Where can I get more help or offer suggestions?

Reach out to the Worship Times development team here. We’d love to hear from you.
sections.changelog:
1.2.3

  • Added more time options for Livebar settings

1.2.2

  • Fixed error message being generated by class and function using the same name. Used __construct instead. Thank you to HighRollerUSA for catching the error.

1.2.1

  • Timezone bug fix with other calendar programs. Sped up loading to stop pinging Breeze if feed is null.

1.2.0

  • Added the Livebar feature from Breeze

1.1.0

  • Bug fixes to address API changes with Breeze CMS
  • General fixes and improvements

1.0.2

  • Bug fixes to address possible javascript conflict with donation shortcode

1.0.1

  • Added donation form function. Note, this requires an SSL cert installed on your server

1.0.0

  • Initial release

description:
A plugin that brings in your Breeze church management software data (events, full calendar, pledges, donations and contributions) for display on your WordPress website. It can be displayed via widgets on a sidebar or shortcodes within pages and posts.

This plugin is built and supported by Worship Times and is not an official product of Breeze.

upgrade_notice.1.2.3: Added more time options for Livebar settings

screenshots.caption: Options Area - Use this area to link to your account by adding your Breeze API Key, subdomain and the amount of future days to pull data in for.
Shortcode Generator - To drop a Breeze events list, full calendar or campaign list onto a page or a post, use the Breeze shortcode generator located in the add media area.
Widget - To drop a Breeze event or campaign list onto a sidebar, drag the widget into place and select your preferences.
